Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: nTop 6-DOF flight dynamics framework - Phase 1 complete

Phase 1 deliverables:
- Wing geometry parser from nTop CSV exports (LE/TE points)
- Mass properties converter (US Customary to AVL units)
- AVL geometry file generator with wing, tail, and control surfaces
- AVL run case generator for multiple flight conditions
- AVL Python interface for automated analysis
- US Standard Atmosphere model
- Complete project structure and documentation

Key features:
- Automated AVL geometry generation from nTop exports
- Properly discretized vortex lattice panels (20 wing, 12 h-tail, 10 v-tail)
- Control surfaces: flaperons (80% chord, 75% span), elevator, rudder
- Flight conditions: cruise (M0.25@20kft), climb, landing
- NACA 2412 wing airfoil, NACA 0012 tail airfoils

Aircraft configuration:
- Wing: 19.89 ft span, 199.94 ftÂ² area, AR=1.98 (highly swept delta)
- Mass: 234.8 slugs (7,555 lbm)
- CG: (12.92, 0.001, 0.045) ft
- Estimated tail surfaces using volume coefficients

Status: Phase 1 complete, geometry validated in AVL
Next: Phase 2 - Core 6-DOF dynamics implementation
